title: Halden’s Gambit Activated
outcome: Halden’s secret failsafe activates: the BCI begins randomly reassigning privileges, restrictions, and access daily across the city. Everyone feels what it is to be both ‘elite’ and ‘ghost’ in turn. Oksana and Rada frantically seek a resolution as order teeters and surprising alliances form. The experiment forces Stenograd to confront the meaning of justice, equality—and whether they’re truly ready for self-governance without the BCI.

events.description: Stenograd wakes to find the BCI has scrambled nearly everyone’s access, privileges, and restrictions at random overnight—no scores make sense, daily life is unpredictable.
Oksana Lintz and Rada Miskovic investigate the code base and discover evidence of Halden’s planned failsafe, triggered by large-scale abuse and loss of public trust.
Residents, forced to cooperate with new groups each day, form surprising alliances and openly question the value of BCI-driven order versus shared governance.
A citywide conference emerges organically, with citizens and key officials debating permanent alternatives to the BCI amid ongoing randomness.
After weeks of chaos and shared experience, the city holds a vote: do they restore a reformed BCI or move forward with equality-based governance? The decision will determine Stenograd’s future.
